subject: Track and Field
Colleges and Universities
Immigration and Emigration
lead_paragraph: Kelvin Serem comes from a family of subsistence farmers in Kenya, but he won a scholarship to a private school in New Jersey in 2011 and now attends Lafayette College as a student-athlete, all while supporting a school he helped have built in his home village.
